title: Natural Health, Wellness for Mind, body and soul | Your Holistic Doc
author: Your Holistic Doc
description: Shop a wide range of natural medicine, herbal pharmacy, holistic medicine for mind and body. Find the best quality natural and organic products online.
cleaned_text: With Dr. Cometa, your holistic doc, Integrative Medicine has never been the medicine of the future; it has always been the medicine of today. Your Holistic Doc... where conventional medical training and complementary medicine combine to create Wellness. Dr. Cometa is a physician who practices Integrative Medicine through a Mind-Body approach. She has integrated her conventional medical school and Family Medicine Residency hospital training with her complementary medical education since she began to practice medicine in 1992.
